trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] In Azure AD B2C, your policy's name will be prefixed with `b2c_1_`, like `b2c_1_sign_up`.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] In Azure AD B2C, your policy's name will be prefixed with `b2c_1_`, like `b2c_1_sign_up`.

trans-unit.source: You are free to use your policies across all of your apps, both client and server.
trans-unit.target: You are free to use your policies across all of your apps, both client and server.

trans-unit.source: If you've previously created policies in another B2C walk-through, there is no need to do so again.
trans-unit.target: If you've previously created policies in another B2C walk-through, there is no need to do so again.

trans-unit.source: You may reuse the policies you've previously created in the portal if they match the requirements of the application.
trans-unit.target: You may reuse the policies you've previously created in the portal if they match the requirements of the application.
